tweet: 1/9  The Bear Market 2018 🐻 83 Projects in Numbers from #Rekt to least #Rekt  Most #REKT are $BCD, $ZEC and $AION  Least #REKT $RVN, $BNB and $BTC  1. $BCD 2. @zcashco $ZEC 3. @Aion_Network $AION 4. @SALTLending $SALT 5. @wax_io $WAX 6. @chainlink $LINK 7. $NXT 8. $BTCP 9. $LRC  https://t.co/Saoo79OIb5

1/  WARNING: BNB providers  Due to a bug in the @binance  BNB contract it's possible to add liquidity to the Uniswap BNB<>ETH liquidity pool but not remove it.   This bug is a variation on the "missing return value" ERC20 bug which affects several tokens.   https://t.co/x77ccBjAn9

4/ @UniswapExchange supports custom exchange contracts - so creating one that supports BNB will not be difficult. But this custom support is only needed because BNB is NOT an ERC20 token - it does not contain a valid implementation of EIP20.    https://t.co/rmvrcXs9Dj

3/ Fortunately this bug was discovered by an engineer at @TotleCrypto while only ~$2000 dollars worth of tokens were locked up in the pool. Unfortunately, these funds are locked permanently. BNB has been removed from the Uniswap website. Apologies to anyone affected.
Interesting bug in Solidity that affects the BNB and OMG tokens. Nothing critical, but it points out just how much ground we have to cover.   https://t.co/9CTssmCkIY
